unnormalised: Arrey yaar, this AI stuff is moving so fast, no? I remember when I first heard about it back in '18, it seemed like something out of a Rajinikanth movie. Now my nephew, he's using some AI tool to write his school essays! He showed me, this app generated a whole piece on the Indian economy in like, 5 mins! And my neighbor's daughter, she's learning Python and says she'll get a job at Google with a â‚¹40 lakh package. I'm still trying to figure out how to forward WhatsApp messages properly, and these kids are building AI. It's wild, no?
normalised: Arrey yaar, this A-I stuff is moving so fast, no? I remember when I first heard about it back in two thousand eighteen, it seemed like something out of a Rajinikanth movie. Now my nephew, he's using some A-I tool to write his school essays! He showed me, this app generated a whole piece on the Indian economy in like, five minutes! And my neighbor's daughter, she's learning Python and says she'll get a job at Google with a rupee forty lakh package. I'm still trying to figure out how to forward WhatsApp messages properly, and these kids are building A-I. It's wild, no?
